attributes.action: Commemorate Memory of Polish generals served in Polish Armed Forces under British command in WWII
attributes.additional_details: Please give a names of streets and blue plaque in London particulary Polish generals as follows Anders  Sosabowski Sosnkowski Maczek Kopanski Sulik  After the war they cannot came back to Poland they  have been abandoned and forgotten by British Allie  some of them worked as a common workers Sosabowski for example in Acton  Maczek in Scotland Please give them this honour because they earned it   Please not only remember about Polish fighter pilots but also these who fought on field and sea in Polish Armed Forces under British command Please remember them today
